data.name: Bembien
data.companyDescription: @ location: Woven Artisans’ Basket Bags @ Bali
data.title: Looking for a Co-Marketing campaign partnership
data.description: Handmade Basket Bags from natural materials by talented artisans from around the world. 10% of Bembien’s proceeds go to Nest, a nonprofit committed to the social and economic advancement of artisans
notes: Social contest Open for new ideas

data.name: Patagonia
data.companyDescription: @location: Activewear and sport gear retailers @Ventura, California
data.title: Looking for a Business development partnership
data.description: Patagonia is an outdoor apparel company based in Ventura, California. A certified B-Corporation, Patagonia’s mission is to build the best product, cause no unnecessary harm and use its business to inspire and implement solutions to the environmental crisis.
notes: Patagonia is looking to expand the business to new fields and promote Cross media campaigns with a fresh young brand.

data.name: Jango
data.companyDescription: location: Free online music streaming service @ New York, NY
data.title: Jango is looking for a Business development partnership
data.description: Jango is a free custom radio that plays your favorite music. Jango is all about making online music easy and fun - a free online music streaming service that allows you to create custom radio stations.
notes: Jango is about to launch a new music gaming add-on feature to our app. We are looking for a strategic partner either from the gaming, music or any other relevant field, to team-up with.

data.name: Woodies
data.companyDescription: @ location: Bamboo designed Sunglasses@ Malibu, CA
data.title: Woodies is looking for a Co-Marketing Campaign Partnership
data.description: Woodies Bamboo Sunglasses: The combination of natural materials, handmade construction, and a connection to the wholesome fashion of the 1950's.
notes: Woodies is launching a new product line - Wood and bamboo designed Watches and a new matching Sunglasses collection. We are looking for a co-marketing partner to create a cool fashion campaign, promoted in Social media platforms

data.name: PlanetFitness
area: @ location: gym and fitness centers @Hampton, New Hampshire US
data.companyDescription: @ location: Bamboo designed Sunglasses@ Malibu, CA
data.title: PlanetFitness  is looking for Strategic Partnerships
data.description: PlanetFitness, one of the largest and fastest growing franchisors and operators of fitness centers in the U.S, with more than 1,500 locations in 50 states, is taking the fitness industry by storm! We've revolutionized the industry with our combination of affordable prices, great value and non-intimidating Judgement Free Zone®. PlanetFitness' mission is to enhance people's lives by providing a high-quality fitness experience
notes: is running a serial of ‘Open Club’ - Music and Fitness events in more than 500 clubs, across 50 states. We invite brands to join our awesome events from sport/music/bar or related industries
